title: Table 157 - Row 8
clause_text: Sr. No. (1): 5 | Occupancy (2): Mercantile (Markets, Departmental stores, Shops and other commercial uses). (I.T.Parks) | Parking Space required (3): One parking space for every 40-sq.m of floor area up to 800 sq. m and one parking space for every 80-sq.m of space for areas exceeding 800 sq. m provided

values: Mercantile (Markets, Departmental stores, Shops and other commercial uses). (I.T.Parks)
